title: Bloomberg Markets: DeHaas on Impact of Workplace Diversity
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: DeHaas on Impact of Workplace Diversity
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Deborah DeHaas Chief Inclusion Officer Deloitte Discussing Deloitte’s Inclusion Pulse Survey regarding the impact diversity can have on a company's workforce. Oliver Renick of Bloomberg News also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
